workshop.title: Continuous Inspection with Sonar Qube
workshop.description: This workshop will walk you through how to manage application lifecycle and do code review using sonarQube. Learn how SonarQube can save time and improve performance by reviewing code and how to to solve those bugs in Agile development

labs.title: Lab 050: Setup
labs.description: Setup trial account and provision Developer Cloud Service. Create compartment, VCN and instance in OCI.

labs.title: Lab 100: Configure Developer Cloud Service
labs.description: Create project in Developer Cloud Service, clone project from Git repo and configure project to run build jobs.

labs.title: Lab 200: Configure SonarQube Server
labs.description: Deploying SonarQube server in Compute Instance, connecting it to Developer Cloud Service and then running analysis on the project to check for potential issues and bug.

labs.title: Lab 300: Fix Issues in the Code
labs.description: Look for issues identified in SonarQube, create a issue in Developer Cloud Service and resolve issue using built in git.

labs.title: Lab 400: Deploy Microservice to Cloud
labs.description: Deploy the fixed code as a webservice inside a Docker container to cloud.
